name: Benga
description: '''Adegbenga Otomayomi Adejumo''' (born 1 September 1986), known as '''Benga''', is a British musician from [[Croydon]], known for being a pioneer of [[dubstep]] record production. He has been featured on a variety of compilations including [[Mary Anne Hobbs]]'s ''[[Warrior Dubz]]'', [[Tempa]]'s ''The Roots of Dubstep'' and the [[BBC Radio 1Xtra]] anniversary mix.
